version_description:
● List colors.
● Set tasks priorities.
● Improved performance.
● Apple Watch app improvements.

We love to hear your feedback.
Go to Settings > Feedback & Support > Support and let us hear your voice :)

Improved performance & small bugs fixes.

We love to hear your feedback.
Go to Settings > Feedback & Support > Support and let us hear your voice :)

EXCITING UPDATE!

● Text Size now conforms to iPhone's Settings -> Display & Brightness -> Text Size.
● Quick Actions - Firmly press gTasks icon on your home screen for a quick actions menu.
● Peek & Pop - Firmly press a list in the lists view for a quick glance of the list's content.
● Spotlight Search - Use your iPhone's search to find tasks in gTasks.

○ Fixed bugs and improved performance.

We love to hear your feedback.
Go to Settings > Feedback & Support > Support and let us hear your voice :)
